ops.js:
showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:24}); // {Aeris}
“They said that the Temple
itself is the Black Materia.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:56}); // {Aeris}
“So, this whole building
is the Black Materia?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:58}); // {Aeris}
“Hmm, it's pretty hard.
You see this is a model of the Temple.”{PAUSE}“And inside it is a device,
which gets smaller
each time you solve a puzzle.”{PAUSE}“As the model becomes smaller,
you become smaller too.”{PAUSE}“Until it's small enough to fit
in the palm of your hand.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:60}); // {Aeris}
“Yes, but there's one thing…”{PAUSE}“You can only answer the puzzles
inside the Temple.”{PAUSE}“So, anyone who solves the puzzle
will be crushed by the Temple.”

dialogStrings:
Sephiroth
“Soon…
we will become one.”

{Aeris}
“How do you intend
to become one with the Planet?”

Sephiroth
“It's simple.”{PAUSE}“Once the Planet is hurt,
it gathers Spirit Energy to heal the injury.”

Sephiroth
“The amount of energy gathered
depends on the size of the injury.”

Sephiroth
“…What would happen
if there was an injury that threatened
the very life of the Planet?”{PAUSE}“Think how much energy would be gathered!”

Sephiroth
“Ha ha ha.
And at the center of that injury,
will be me.”{PAUSE}“All that boundless energy will be mine.”

Sephiroth
“By merging with all the energy of the Planet,
I will become a new life form,
a new existence.”{PAUSE}“Melding with the Planet…
I will cease to exist as I am now…”{PAUSE}“Only to be reborn as a 'God'
to rule over every soul.”

{Aeris}
“An injury powerful enough
to destroy the Planet?”{PAUSE}“Injure…the Planet?”

Sephiroth
“Behold that mural.
The Ultimate Destructive Magic…Meteor.”

{Cloud}
“That'll never happen!”
“Wake up!!”

{Cloud}
“Where are you!? Sephiroth!!”

{Aeris}
“Wait, {Cloud}!”

{Cloud}
“What is this?”

{Aeris}
“…There's something written on it.”

{Aeris}
“B.l.a.c.k…M.a.t.e.r.i.a.”

{Cloud}
“Black Materia!!”

{Aeris}
“Hey!”

{Aeris}
“…Black Materia.”

{Aeris}
“What should we do, {Cloud}?”
{CHOICE}Shake it
{CHOICE}Take it
{CHOICE}Leave it

{Aeris}
“Wait a minute.
I'll ask!”

{Aeris}
“I don't understand…”

{Aeris}
“What?”

{Aeris}
“Really!?”

{Aeris}
“They said that the Temple
itself is the Black Materia.”

{Aeris}
“If we could only move this,
we could take the Black Materia.”{PAUSE}“But, the Temple would collapse.”

{Barret}
“Then just leave it.”{PAUSE}“If we can't take it,
then neither can Sephiroth, right?”

{Tifa}
“Let's just leave it, OK?”

{Red XIII}
“That'll be safer.
If no one else can take it…”{PAUSE}“Then Sephiroth can't either, right?”

{Cait Sith}
“The Ancients were a mean bunch.
This way, no one'll be able to get it.”

{Vincent}
“I guess that means it's safe here.”

{Yuffie}
“Let's just leave it and
get the hell out of here!”

{Cid}
“Guess stuff this dangerous is best left alone?”

{Cloud}
“No.
We've got to think of a way to get it out.”

{Cloud}
“Because Sephiroth has
lots of different flunkies.”{PAUSE}“It's nothing to him to throw their lives away
to get the Black Materia.”

{Cloud}
“This place isn't safe.”

{Aeris}
“So what are we going to do?”

{Cait Sith}
“I heard your situation!”

“Hi, {Cloud}.
This is {Cait Sith}.”{PAUSE}“I overheard the whole story!”

{Cait Sith}
“Don't forget about me.”

{Cait Sith}
“Everything you said makes perfect sense!”{PAUSE}“You can use my stuffed body
for the future of the Planet.”

{Cloud}
“We can't let Sephiroth
get his hands on the Black Materia.”{PAUSE}“And we can't let the Shinra
get theirs on it either.”

{Cait Sith}
“So that means you don't trust me?”

{Cait Sith}
“But {Cloud}.
There's really nothing else you can do.”{PAUSE}“Everyone, please trust me.”
{CHOICE}I guess we have no choice
{CHOICE}No way

{Cait Sith}
“All righty then!
Leave it all to me!”

{Cait Sith}
“You sure are stubborn, {Cloud}.”

{Cait Sith}
“Everyone, hurry up and get outside!”{PAUSE}“I'll go with you to a safe place.”

{Cait Sith}
“Please hurry, you've got to get out of here!”{PAUSE}“I'll be waiting at the exit!”

{Cait Sith}
“Please believe me, {Cloud}.”
{CHOICE}Hmmm, I guess I have to
{CHOICE}How can I?

{Cait Sith}
“This must be it!”

{Cait Sith}
“The Ancients sure did a
great job making this.”

{Cait Sith}
“I can protect the Planet too!
I'm kinda embarrassed…”

{Cait Sith}
“There's plenty of stuffed toys
like my body around,
but there's only one me!”

{Cait Sith}
“Don't forget me even if another
{Cait Sith} comes along.”

{Cait Sith}
“Good bye, then!
I guess I'm off to save the Planet…”

{Cloud}
“What do they mean?”

{Aeris}
“So, this whole building
is the Black Materia?”

{Cloud}
“This huge Temple?
This is the Black Materia!?”{PAUSE}“Then no one could take it.”

{Aeris}
“Hmm, it's pretty hard.
You see this is a model of the Temple.”{PAUSE}“And inside it is a device,
which gets smaller
each time you solve a puzzle.”{PAUSE}“As the model becomes smaller,
you become smaller too.”{PAUSE}“Until it's small enough to fit
in the palm of your hand.”

{Cloud}
“So, if we solve the puzzles,
the Black Materia will get smaller and smaller
and we can take it out?”

{Aeris}
“Yes, but there's one thing…”{PAUSE}“You can only answer the puzzles
inside the Temple.”{PAUSE}“So, anyone who solves the puzzle
will be crushed by the Temple.”

{Cloud}
“I see…
the Ancients didn't want
dangerous magic
to be taken out of the Temple so easily…”
